corrupt.translation[0].definitions[0].de: using your power in a dishonest or illegal way in order to get an advantage for yourself
corrupt.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Corrupt judges have taken millions of dollars in bribes.
corrupt.translation[0].definitions[2].de: something that is corrupt is not pure or has been damaged or partly ruined
corrupt.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to encourage someone to start behaving in an immoral or dishonest way
corrupt.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Young prisoners are being corrupted by the older, long-term offenders.
corrupt.translation[1].definitions[1].de: to change the traditional form of something, such as a language, so that it becomes worse than it was
corrupt.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: The culture has been corrupted by Western influences.
corrupt.translation[1].definitions[2].de: to change the information in a computer, so that the computer does not work properly anymore
corrupt.translation[1].definitions[2].ex: a virus which corrupts the data on your hard drive
corrupt.translation[2].definitions[0].de: using power in a dishonest or illegal way in order to get money or an advantage of some kind
corrupt.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: Swiss justice, in our experience, is as tough on corrupt bankers as it is on all other criminals.
people wilfully involved in bribery or other corrupt practices
corrupt.translation[2].definitions[1].de: information on a computer that is corrupt has been damaged and can no longer be read or used by a computer
corrupt.translation[2].definitions[1].ex: The file may contain corrupt data and may cause your machine to crash.
corrupt.translation[3].definitions[0].de: to encourage someone to behave in an immoral or dishonest way
corrupt.translation[3].definitions[0].ex: US politics has been corrupted by money and the influence of special interests.
corrupt.translation[3].definitions[1].de: to damage information on a computer, so that it can no longer be read or used by a computer
corrupt.translation[3].definitions[1].ex: viruses which can corrupt and destroy computer data
